attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app a picture of a penis appeared. The penis had a mouth that sang Gangam Style really loudly. When I tried to close the app, it wouldn't work. Instead, the talking penis yelled "YOU CANNOT KILL ME, FOR I AM GOD." This app is absolutely awful.
